warthamanaya (2008) wana wita diwayina pura pihituwa athi adhyayana madhyasthana 22 k mulika kota ganimin kriyathmaka wana mehi pradhana mandapaya nawala-nugegoda pihita atha. 1.injineru thakshana pitaya krushi ha wawili injineru, siwil injineru, widuli ha parighanaka injineru, ganithaya ha injineru darshanaya, yanthrika injineru, peshakarma ha angalum thakshanaya yana departhamenthu 06 kin samanwithaya. 2.swabhawika widya pitaya bhauthika widya, ganitha, rasayana widya, udhida widya, sathwa widya, yanadi departhamenthu walin samanwithaya. 3.manawa shasthra ha samaja widya pitaya 4.adhyapana pitaya 1.adhyapana thakshana anshaya 2.pradeshiya adhyapana sewa anshaya 3.thorathuruthakshana anshaya 4.paryeshana anshaya shishya sangamaya[sanskaranaya] wishwa widyalayiya shishya sangamaya pita shishya sangam hatharakin samanwitha wana athara wishwawidyalaya thula shishya ayithin ha shishya kriyakarakam wenuwen peni sitiyi.

mese labagath mudal el.ti.ti.ee. ye bhandagaraya thara kirima sandaha yodagena athayi da parikshanawaladi anawaranaya karagena athi bawa kottasa bara polis adhikari ee.pi.ji. da es gunawardhana mahatha kiyayi.sudupata wan riyakin pamini kandayamak siya samiyan pahara gena giya bawata kanthawan kipadenaku wisin ma thi්rakunamalaya saha uppuweli yana polis sthanawalata paminili kara thibe.samiyan soya dima sandaha mudal awashya bawath ese nomathi nam owun mara damana bawath kiyamin kandayamak thamanta tharjanaya kala bawath ema kanthawo siya paminiliwala sandahan karathi.samiyan bera ganima sandaha kanakara aabharana pawa ukas kota mudal laba dunna da me wanathuruth siya samiyan gana kisima thorathurak ho labi nathayi pawasana paminili thihakata aasanna sankhyawak me wana wita labi thibe.allaganna lada badubahiradiyamelesa mudal labagena aththe adala kanthawan lawa banku ginumwalata mudal bara kara ganimini.paudgalika rakshana aayathanayaka sewaya karana kalamanakaruwakugen rupiyal laksha pahak mowun illa aththe mudal laba nodunahoth ohuge dehawiridi daruwa mara damana bawata tharjanaya karamini.
